news.content: The Egyptian Exchange app now includes a comprehensive news system. Stay updated with market alerts, app updates, and important announcements!

news.title: ðŸš€ Egyptian Exchange App v1.0 Released!
news.content:
We're excited to announce the release of version 0.9.2 of the Egyptian Exchange App! This update includes:

**New Features:**
- Real-time stock data scraping
- Portfolio management
- Watchlist functionality
- Market countdown timer
- News system

**Improvements:**
- Better performance
- Enhanced UI/UX
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Download the latest version from our GitHub releases page.

news.title: ðŸ”” Market Alert: EGX30 Reaches New High
news.content:
The Egyptian Exchange's benchmark EGX30 index has reached a new all-time high today, driven by strong performance in banking and telecommunications sectors.

**Key Highlights:**
- EGX30 up 2.5% to 18,500 points
- Banking sector leads gains
- Trading volume exceeds daily average

Investors are advised to monitor market conditions closely.

news.title: ðŸ“Š Weekly Market Summary
news.content:
Here's your weekly market summary for the Egyptian Exchange:

**Performance:**
- EGX30: +1.8% for the week
- EGX70: +2.1% for the week
- Total trading volume: EGP 12.5 billion

**Top Performers:**
- Banking sector: +3.2%
- Real Estate: +2.8%
- Telecommunications: +2.1%

Next week's outlook remains positive with several earnings announcements expected.
